CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'External',SHS_Street_i__c &" "& SHS_Street2_i__c &", "& SHS_City_i__c &", "& SHS_Postal_code__c&", "& SHS_Country_iso3__c, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Siemens_Healthineers',SHS_Street__c &", "& SHS_Zip_code__c &", "& SHS_City__c &", "& SHS_Country_iso3__c, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Siemens',SHS_Street__c &", "& SHS_Zip_code__c &", "& SHS_City__c &", "& SHS_Country_iso3__c, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'P40_Account',SHS_Street__c &", "& SHS_Zip_code__c &", "& SHS_City__c &", "& SHS_Country_iso3__c,NULL))))
CustomField.label: Address
